source:
%%sql
-- Build high_court_dim table -- merge

-- Notes - Addresses are only supplied for Inspectors - need to check inspector count against addresses data

-- Gets modified or deleted from source rows

CREATE OR REPLACE TEMPORARY VIEW high_court_dim_new 

    AS

-- gets data that matches of SourceID and flags that it is modified based on a row (md5) hash. Flags as "NewData"
-- gets data that is in the target but not in source. Flags as "DeletedData"

SELECT DISTINCT
    CASE
        WHEN T1.CaseReference IS NULL
        THEN T4.HighCourtID
        ELSE NULL
    END                     AS HighCourtID, -- surrogate key
    T1.appsefno             AS CaseReference, 
    T1.appnum               AS AppealRefNumber,
    T1.app1                 AS App1,
    T1.lacode               AS LPACode,
    T2.LPAID                AS LPAID,
    T1.appyear              AS AppYear,
    T1.app3                 AS App3,
    T1.welsh_office         AS IsWelshOffice,
    T1.case                 AS CaseName,
    T1.hc_ref               AS HCRef,
    T1.la_name              AS LAName,
    T1.location             AS CaseLocation,
    T1.date                 AS HighCourtDate,
    T1. tsd_ref             AS TSFRef,
    T1.related_reference_s  AS RelatedReferences,
    T1.inspector            AS InspectorName,
    T1.pins_group           AS PinsGroup,
    T1.dir_im               AS DIROrIM,
    T1.procedure            AS Procedure,
    T1.legal                AS Legal,
    T1.date_of_dl           AS DateOfDL,
    T1.file_to_dir_im       AS FileToDIROrIMDate,
    T1.ic_to_tsd            AS ICToTSDDate,
    T1.advice               AS AdviceDate,
    T1.inst_to_tsd          AS InstToTSDDate,
    T1.instruct             AS Instruct,
    T1.consent              AS ConsentDate,
    T1.date_of_hearing      AS DateOfHearing,
    T1.outcome              AS Outcome,
    T1.court                AS CourtDate,
    T1.transcript                   AS TranscriptDate,
    T1.transcript_number            AS TranscriptNumber,
    T1.appeal                       AS IsAppeal,
    T1.applicant                    AS Applicant,
    T1.sse_defend                   AS SSEDefend,
    T1.outcome_sse                  AS SSEOutcome,
    T1.date_of_court_order          AS CourtOrderDate,
    T1.transcript_received          AS TranscriptReceivedDate,
    T1.house_of_lords               AS IsHouseOfLords,
    T1.pins_aa                      AS PINSAA,
    T1.outcome2                     AS Outcome2,
    T1.original                     AS IsOriginal,
    T1.costs_to_be_written_off      AS AreCostsToBeWrittenOff,
    T1.bf                           AS BF,
    T1.for2                         AS FOR2,
    T1.appeal_type                  AS AppealType,
    T1.challenge                    AS Challenge,
    T1.claim_date                   AS ClaimDate,
    T1.invoice_date                 AS InvoiceDate,
    T1.debt_recovery_date           AS DebtRecoveryDate,
    T1.payment_receipt_date         AS PaymentReceivedDate,
    T1.pco                          AS IsPCO,
    T1.mp                           AS IsMP,
    T1.redet                        AS IsRedet,
    T1.area                         AS CaseArea,
    T1.lawyer                       AS CaseLawyer,
    T1.redet_file                   AS RedetFile,
    T1.redet_minute                 AS RedetMinute,
    T1.costs                        AS CaseCosts,
    T1.status                       AS CaseStatus,
    T1.amount                               AS CaseAmount,
    T1.gl_list                              AS GLList,
    T1.ssma_timestamp                       AS SSMATimeStamp,
    T3.SourceSystemID                       AS SourceSystemID,
    to_timestamp(T1.expected_from)          AS IngestionDate,
    NULL as ValidTo,
    md5(concat( 
        IFNULL(T1.appsefno,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.appnum,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.T1.app1,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.lacode,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.appyearv,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.app3,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.welsh_office,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.case,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.hc_ref,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.la_name,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.location,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.date,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1. tsd_ref,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.related_reference_s,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.inspector,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.pins_group,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.dir_im,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.procedure,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.legal,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.date_of_dl,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.file_to_dir_i,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.ic_to_tsd,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.advice,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.inst_to_tsd,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.instruct,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.consent,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.date_of_hearing,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.outcome,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.court,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.transcript,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.transcript_number,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.appeal,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.applicant,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.sse_defend,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.outcome_sse,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.date_of_court_orderv,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.transcript_received,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.house_of_lords,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.pins_aa,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.outcome2,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.original,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.costs_to_be_written_off,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.bf,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.for2,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.appeal_type,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.challenge,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.claim_datev,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.invoice_date,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.debt_recovery_date,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.payment_receipt_date,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.pco,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.mp,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.redet,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.area,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.lawyer,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.redet_file,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.redet_minute,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1costs,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.status,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.amount,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.gl_list,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.ssma_timestamp,'.')))     AS RowID, 
    'Y'                                     AS IsActive, 
    T7.IsActive                             AS HistoricIsActive

FROM odw_standardised_db.vw_saphr T1
LEFT JOIN odw_standardised_db.vw_addresses T2 ON T1.Pers_No = T2.Staff_Number
LEFT JOIN odw_standardised_db.vw_email T3 ON T1.Pers_No = T3.Staff_Number
LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.main_sourcesystem_fact T4 ON "SAP HR" = T4.Description and T4.IsActive = 'Y'
LEFT JOIN ( SELECT staff_number, max(ded_from) as AnnualLeaveStartDate
            FROM odw_standardised_db.vw_leave
            GROUP BY Staff_Number) T5 ON T1.Pers_No = T5.staff_number   
LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.hr_employee_fact T8 ON T1.Pers_No = T8.PersNumber AND T8.IsActive = 'Y' 
FULL JOIN odw_harmonised_db.hr_high_court_dim T7 ON T8.EmployeeID = T7.EmployeeID AND T7.IsActive = 'Y'
WHERE
        -- flags new data        
        ( CASE
            WHEN T1.Pers_No = T7.EmployeeID AND md5(concat( IFNULL(T1.First_name,'.'),IFNULL(T1.Last_name,'.'), IFNULL(T1.Gender_Key, '.'), IFNULL(T2.Street_and_House_Number, '.'),
                IFNULL(T2.`2nd_Address_Line`, '.'),IFNULL(T2.District, '.'), IFNULL(T2.City, '.'),IFNULL(T2.Region_State_Province_Count, '.'),IFNULL(T2.Postal_Code, '.'),IFNULL(T3.Email_Address, '.'),
                IFNULL(T2.Personal_Mobile, '.'), IFNULL(T2.Work_Mobile, '.'), IFNULL(T1.FTE,'.'),IFNULL(T1.Wk_hrs,'.'),IFNULL(T1.Indicator_Part_Time_Employee,'.'),T1.Employment_Status,
                IFNULL(T1.Civil_Service_Start, '.'),IFNULL(T1.Date_to_Current_Job, '.'), IFNULL(T1.Seniority_Date, '.'),IFNULL(T1.Org_Start_Date, '.'),IFNULL(T1.Fix_Term_End_Date, '.'),
                IFNULL(T1.Loan_Start_Date, '.'),IFNULL(T1.Loan_End_Date, '.'),IFNULL(T1.Payroll_Area,'.'), IFNULL(T1.Assignment_Number, '.'), IFNULL(T1.Employee_Group,'.'),IFNULL(T1.curr,'.'), 
                IFNULL(T1.Date_to_Subst_Grade,'.')))  <> T7.RowID     
            THEN 'Y'
            WHEN T7.HighCourtID IS NULL
            THEN 'Y'
            ELSE 'N'
        END  = 'Y' )
    AND T1.Pers_No IS NOT NULL
;

# Dataset is created that contains changed data and corresponding target data
- This script combines data that has been updated, Deleted or is new, with corresponding target data
- View **high_court_dim_new** is unioned to the target data filter to only those rows where changes have been detected
## View high_court_dim_changed_rows is created

%%sql

-- Create new and updated dataset

CREATE OR REPLACE TEMPORARY  VIEW high_court_dim_changed_rows

    AS

-- gets updated, deleted and new rows 

SELECT DISTINCT
    HighCourtID, -- surrogate key
    CaseReference, 
    AppealRefNumber,
    App1,
    LPACode,
    LPAID,
    AppYear,
    App3,
    WelshOffice,
    CaseName,
    HCRef,
    LAName,
    CaseLocation,
    HighCourtDate,
    TSFRef,
    RelatedReferences,
    InspectorName,
    PinsGroup,
    DIROrIM,
    Procedure,
    Legal,
    DateOfDL,
    FileToDIROrIMDate,
    ICToTSDDate,
    AdviceDate,
    InstToTSDDate,
    Instruct,
    ConsentDate,
    DateOfHearing,
    Outcome,
    CourtDate,
    TranscriptDate,
    TranscriptNumber,
    IsAppeal,
    Applicant,
    SSEDefend,
    SSEOutcome,
    CourtOrderDate,
    TranscriptReceivedDate,
    IsHouseOfLords,
    PINSAA,
    Outcome2,
    IsOriginal,
    AreCostsToBeWrittenOff,
    BF,
    FOR2,
    AppealType,
    Challenge,
    ClaimDate,
    InvoiceDate,
    DebtRecoveryDate,
    PaymentReceivedDate,
    IsPCO,
    IsMP,
    IsRedet,
    CaseArea,
    CaseLawyer,
    RedetFile,
    RedetMinute,
    CaseCosts,
    CaseStatus,
    CaseAmount,
    GLList,
    SSMATimeStamp,
    SourceSystemID,
    IngestionDate,
    ValidTo,
    RowID,
    IsActive
From high_court_dim_new WHERE HistoricIsActive = 'Y' or HistoricIsActive IS NULL

    UNION ALL

-- gets original versions of updated rows so we can update EndDate and set IsActive flag to 'N'

SELECT DISTINCT
    HighCourtID, -- surrogate key
    CaseReference, 
    AppealRefNumber,
    App1,
    LPACode,
    LPAID,
    AppYear,
    App3,
    WelshOffice,
    CaseName,
    HCRef,
    LAName,
    CaseLocation,
    HighCourtDate,
    TSFRef,
    InspectorName,
    CaseState,
    PinsGroup,
    DIROrIM,
    Procedure,
    Legal,
    DateOfDL,
    FileToDIROrIMDate,
    ICToTSDDate,
    AdviceDate,
    InstToTSDDate,
    Instruct,
    ConsentDate,
    DateOfHearing,
    Outcome,
    CourtDate,
    TranscriptDate,
    TranscriptNumber,
    IsAppeal,
    Applicant,
    SSEDefend,
    SSEOutcome,
    CourtOrderDate,
    TranscriptReceivedDate,
    IsHouseOfLords,
    PINSAA,
    Outcome2,
    IsOriginal,
    AreCostsToBeWrittenOff,
    BF,
    AppealType,
    Challenge,
    ClaimDate,
    InvoiceDate,
    DebtRecoveryDate,
    PaymentReceivedDate,
    IsPCO,
    IsMP,
    IsRedet,
    CaseArea,
    CaseLawyer,
    RedetFile,
    RedetMinute,
    CaseCosts,
    CaseStatus,
    CaseAmount,
    GLList,
    SSMATimeStamp,
    SourceSystemID,
    IngestionDate,
    ValidTo,
    RowID,
    IsActive
FROM odw_harmonised_db.hr_high_court_dim
WHERE CaseReference IN (SELECT CaseReference FROM high_court_dim_new WHERE HighCourtID IS NULL) AND IsActive = 'Y';

%%sql

CREATE OR REPLACE TEMPORARY VIEW Loading_month

    AS

SELECT DISTINCT
    IngestionDate AS IngestionDate,
    to_timestamp(date_sub(IngestionDate,1)) AS ClosingDate,
    'Y' AS IsActive

FROM high_court_dim_new;

CREATE OR REPLACE TEMPORARY VIEW high_court_dim_changed_rows_final

    AS

SELECT 
    T1.HighCourtID, -- surrogate key
    CaseReference, 
    AppealRefNumber,
    App1,
    LPACode,
    LPAID,
    AppYear,
    App3,
    WelshOffice,
    CaseName,
    HCRef,
    LAName,
    CaseLocation,
    HighCourtDate,
    TSFRef,
    InspectorName,
    CaseState,
    PinsGroup,
    DIROrIM,
    Procedure,
    Legal,
    DateOfDL,
    FileToDIROrIMDate,
    ICToTSDDate,
    AdviceDate,
    InstToTSDDate,
    Instruct,
    ConsentDate,
    DateOfHearing,
    Outcome,
    CourtDate,
    TranscriptDate,
    TranscriptNumber,
    IsAppeal,
    Applicant,
    SSEDefend,
    SSEOutcome,
    CourtOrderDate,
    TranscriptReceivedDate,
    IsHouseOfLords,
    PINSAA,
    Outcome2,
    IsOriginal,
    AreCostsToBeWrittenOff,
    BF,
    AppealType,
    Challenge,
    ClaimDate,
    InvoiceDate,
    DebtRecoveryDate,
    PaymentReceivedDate,
    IsPCO,
    IsMP,
    IsRedet,
    CaseArea,
    CaseLawyer,
    RedetFile,
    RedetMinute,
    CaseCosts,
    CaseStatus,
    CaseAmount,
    GLList,
    SSMATimeStamp,
    T1.SourceSystemID,
    T1.IngestionDate,
    T1.ValidTo,
    T1.RowID,
    T1.IsActive,
    T2.ClosingDate
FROM high_court_dim_changed_rows T1
FULL JOIN Loading_month T2 ON T1.IsActive = T2.IsActive

# View high_court_dim_changed_rows is used in a merge (Upsert) statement into the target table
- **WHEN MATCHED** ON the Business Key (i.e. Pers_No from SAP HR), EndDate is set to today -1 day and the IsActive flag is set to 'N'
- **WHEN NOT MATCHED** ON the business key, insert rows
## Table odw_harmonised.high_court_dim is updated

%%sql
-- merge into fact table

MERGE INTO odw_harmonised_db.hr_high_court_dim AS Target
USING high_court_dim_changed_rows_final AS Source

ON Source.HighCourtID = Target.HighCourtID

-- For Updates existing rows

WHEN MATCHED
    THEN 
    UPDATE SET
    Target.ValidTo = to_timestamp(ClosingDate),
    Target.IsActive = 'N'

-- Insert completely new rows
WHEN NOT MATCHED 
    THEN INSERT (HighCourtID, -- surrogate key
        CaseReference, 
        AppealRefNumber,
        App1,
        LPACode,
        LPAID,
        AppYear,
        App3,
        WelshOffice,
        CaseName,
        HCRef,
        LAName,
        CaseLocation,
        HighCourtDate,
        TSFRef,
        InspectorName,
        CaseState,
        PinsGroup,
        DIROrIM,
        Procedure,
        Legal,
        DateOfDL,
        FileToDIROrIMDate,
        ICToTSDDate,
        AdviceDate,
        InstToTSDDate,
        Instruct,
        ConsentDate,
        DateOfHearing,
        Outcome,
        CourtDate,
        TranscriptDate,
        TranscriptNumber,
        IsAppeal,
        Applicant,
        SSEDefend,
        SSEOutcome,
        CourtOrderDate,
        TranscriptReceivedDate,
        IsHouseOfLords,
        PINSAA,
        Outcome2,
        IsOriginal,
        AreCostsToBeWrittenOff,
        BF,
        AppealType,
        Challenge,
        ClaimDate,
        InvoiceDate,
        DebtRecoveryDate,
        PaymentReceivedDate,
        IsPCO,
        IsMP,
        IsRedet,
        CaseArea,
        CaseLawyer,
        RedetFile,
        RedetMinute,
        CaseCosts,
        CaseStatus,
        CaseAmount,
        GLList,
        SSMATimeStamp,
        SourceSystemID,
        IngestionDate,
        ValidTo,
        RowID,
        IsActive)  
        VALUES (Source.HighCourtID, -- surrogate key
        Source.CaseReference, 
        Source.AppealRefNumber,
        Source.App1,
        Source.LPACode,
        Source.LPAID,
        Source.AppYear,
        Source.App3,
        Source.WelshOffice,
        Source.CaseName,
        Source.HCRef,
        Source.LAName,
        Source.CaseLocation,
        Source.HighCourtDate,
        Source.TSFRef,
        Source.InspectorName,
        Source.CaseState,
        Source.PinsGroup,
        Source.DIROrIM,
        Source.Procedure,
        Source.Legal,
        Source.DateOfDL,
        Source.FileToDIROrIMDate,
        Source.ICToTSDDate,
        Source.AdviceDate,
        Source.InstToTSDDate,
        Source.Instruct,
        Source.ConsentDate,
        Source.DateOfHearing,
        Source.Outcome,
        Source.CourtDate,
        Source.TranscriptDate,
        Source.TranscriptNumber,
        Source.IsAppeal,
        Source.Applicant,
        Source.SSEDefend,
        Source.SSEOutcome,
        Source.CourtOrderDate,
        Source.Source.TranscriptReceivedDate,
        Source.IsHouseOfLords,
        Source.PINSAA,
        Source.Outcome2,
        Source.IsOriginal,
        Source.AreCostsToBeWrittenOff,
        Source.BF,
        Source.AppealType,
        Source.Challenge,
        Source.ClaimDate,
        Source.InvoiceDate,
        Source.DebtRecoveryDate,
        Source.PaymentReceivedDate,
        Source.IsPCO,
        Source.IsMP,
        Source.IsRedet,
        Source.CaseArea,
        Source.CaseLawyer,
        Source.RedetFile,
        Source.RedetMinute,
        Source.CaseCosts,
        Source.CaseStatus,
        Source.CaseAmount,
        Source.GLList,
        Source.SSMATimeStamp, 
        Source.SourceSystemID, 
        Source.IngestionDate, 
        Source.ValidTo, 
        Source.RowID, 
        Source.IsActive) ;

# Fix the IDs
- No auto-increment feature is available in delta tables, therefore we need to create new IDs for the inserted rows
- This is done by select the target data and using INSERT OVERWRITE to re-insert the data is a new Row Number
## Table odw_harmonised.high_court_dim is updated

%%sql
-- Insert new SecureInfoID

INSERT OVERWRITE odw_harmonised_db.hr_high_court_dim 

SELECT 
    ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY HighCourtID NULLS LAST) AS HighCourtID, 
    CaseReference, 
    AppealRefNumber,
    App1,
    LPACode,
    LPAID,
    AppYear,
    App3,
    WelshOffice,
    CaseName,
    HCRef,
    LAName,
    CaseLocation,
    HighCourtDate,
    TSFRef,
    InspectorName,
    CaseState,
    PinsGroup,
    DIROrIM,
    Procedure,
    Legal,
    DateOfDL,
    FileToDIROrIMDate,
    ICToTSDDate,
    AdviceDate,
    InstToTSDDate,
    Instruct,
    ConsentDate,
    DateOfHearing,
    Outcome,
    CourtDate,
    TranscriptDate,
    TranscriptNumber,
    IsAppeal,
    Applicant,
    SSEDefend,
    SSEOutcome,
    CourtOrderDate,
    TranscriptReceivedDate,
    IsHouseOfLords,
    PINSAA,
    Outcome2,
    IsOriginal,
    AreCostsToBeWrittenOff,
    BF,
    AppealType,
    Challenge,
    ClaimDate,
    InvoiceDate,
    DebtRecoveryDate,
    PaymentReceivedDate,
    IsPCO,
    IsMP,
    IsRedet,
    CaseArea,
    CaseLawyer,
    RedetFile,
    RedetMinute,
    CaseCosts,
    CaseStatus,
    CaseAmount,
    GLList,
    SSMATimeStamp,
    SourceSystemID,
    IngestionDate,
    ValidTo,
    RowID,
    IsActive
FROM odw_harmonised_db.hr_high_court_dim ;
